page.title: 19Life styles
page.content: Most of the families around here live a very close life style. The younger children go to Paull County Primary School and the older Children go to South Holderness School. At week ends and after school most children either play around the Battery or stay in and watch television. There is a youth club at Paull but very few people go there.Most of the adults go to Paull in an evening to one of the three pubs but there is nothing else for them to do. Quite a few families have videos so stay in to watch films. The main hobbies are fishing and shooting.Most of the children have BMX bikes and go to the Battery to ride them. In an evening some people go to Paull and walk around the streets or watch the ships on the river.
